H0.text: where did african american slaves come from. Indigenous peoples of the Americas

H1.text: where did african american slaves come from. European sailors and soldiers

H2.text: where did african american slaves come from. People from the Indian subcontinent

H3.text: where did african american slaves come from. African people

A4.text: Slaves came primarily from Brazil via the Portuguese slave trade from Angola and other western states in Africa.

A5.text: The majority of the Africans transported to Central America came from present-day Senegambia and other West African regions.
